name: Slimy Purgatory
description:
This game made for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 How To Play

Movement: WASD/Arrow Keys 
Aim&Fire: Mouse&Left Mouse Button
Pause: Esc 
Mute: M

Objectives
  • Kill Explodie and Ranger Soul Fragments
  • Collect Innocent Soul Fragments to get buff
  • Try not to shoot friendly Soul Fragments to get stronger
  • Get highest score, try to survive longer
Story

You died unknowingly and couldn't passed to the after life, got stuck at purgatory. A celestial being appeared out of nowhere and gives you your objective
